name: Orchestra
tagline: A chat-centric workspace for builders and modern teams
description: Orchestra makes workflow simple for teams who build products and rely on communication. With messaging at its core, and a task tracker and AI agents natively built in, work contexts are aligned and teams are connected.

name: Extrovert
tagline: Be top-of-mind by joining relevant conversations on LinkedIn
description: Track your customers' posts, spot key conversations with AI, and help your team build trust with thoughtful comments - in minutes a day.

name: Apps in ChatGPT
tagline: A new generation of apps you can chat with
description: Apps are now in ChatGPT. Chat directly with interactive apps from Spotify, Canva, Zillow, and more, right in your conversation. Built on the new open Apps SDK, it‚Äôs a new generation of apps that turns ChatGPT into the next major app platform.

name: Freshly Squeezed
tagline: Batch resize, crop, convert and optimize images for macOS
description: Freshly Squeezed - A powerful batch image optimization & resizing tool for MacOS. Drag and drop batch resizing, optimization, multiple file formats, custom aspect ratios, presets, custom filenames, iCloud sync and more.

name: Hands Off
tagline: Stop nail biting and other bfrbs with AI
description: Hands Off is a desktop app that intercepts nail biting, skin picking, and other BFRBs in real time. It runs locally on your device, pops up when your hands get near your face, and gradually retrains your brain. All without sending data to the cloud.

name: PromptCompose - Beta
tagline: The command center for your AI prompts.
description: Manage, version, and A/B test your AI prompts ‚Äî just like code. PromptCompose helps teams build reusable templates, inject variables, and deploy optimized prompt versions instantly.

name: Crazzy
tagline: Open Source Lovable for Flutter Apps!!
description: Taking Flutter from "Plain English to the Play Store." Crazzy is an open-source AI toolkit that writes code, generates assets & preps your launch. Built for indie devs by a solo founder.

name: RoosterMe
tagline: Stop snoozing and get out of bed!
description: RoosterMe helps you to wake up on time and get you out of bed, compete with friends in wake up challenges and build a wake up habit.

name: hop.js
tagline: A fast, free, privacy-first CDN for open-source projects
description: A drop-in CDN for open source that adds privacy and safety: zero logs, no tracking, malware scanning, and vulnerability alerts in the browser. Assets are permanently replicated worldwide, so even the first request is fast. Switch by just changing the hostname.

name: Convert & Compress
tagline: Clean and performant Image processing tool
description: Convert & Compress is a native Mac utility designed to be the last image converter you'll ever need. Convert, resize, and adjust quality settings across 20+ image formats with batch processing. The clean, native and private image converter for Mac.

name: Planby Now
tagline: Smart schedules & agendas in minutes with AI
description: üóìÔ∏è Planby Now + AI Greyce builds smart schedules, agendas & line-ups in minutes ‚úÖ Drag & drop, ‚úÖ Share instantly, ‚úÖ Embed anywhere, ‚úÖ Sync with Calendly, WordPress, Webflow, Framer, Lovable, Bolt.new Perfect for events, content planners and more! üöÄ

name: Pulse
tagline: AI powered tasks, notes, and calendar in one workspace
description: Pulse is an AI-powered productivity app that brings your tasks, notes, and calendar into one clean workspace. It helps you plan your day, capture ideas, and stay organized without jumping between tools. Work smarter and keep everything connected.

name: Bullet.so-AI website builder for Notion
tagline: Notion website builder with AI, Membership & Design editor
description: Bullet AI lets you build beautiful websites from Notion in seconds. Add your pages and AI styles everything automatically so you can focus on your content and watch your imagination come alive. No coding needed. Just pick template, customize with AI, launch.

name: runCLAUDErun
tagline: Scheduler for Claude Code (macOS)
description: Automate your Claude CLI commands with a beautiful native macOS app. Schedule tasks to run at specific times, intervals, or in response to system events. Claude Code CLI has become extremely powerful for more than just coding. Schedule it to do your bidding.

name: maia.is your AI that gets things done
tagline: Automate your work by describing what you need.
description: Maia is your AI teammate that automates your tasks by simply listening to what you need. You tell about your work, and it takes care of the rest.

name: TickTag
tagline: Smarter time tracking with tags
description: TickTag - Simple time tracking for macOS. Track your time with projects and categories.

name: rovvi
tagline: Turn customer reviews into marketing content automatically
description: Stop letting customer reviews and testimonials gather dust. rovvi transforms them from 30+ review platforms into blog posts, social content, case studies, and sales deck copy, automatically. Plus, track competitor reviews to spot market gaps and opportunities.

name: AI Mask Labeling by T-Rex Label
tagline: Free-to-use Automatic Mask Annotation
description: Free-to-use AI mask annotation: simply select an object you want to annotate, and AI will automatically annotate all targets. There are no scene restrictions whatsoever.

name: Turbobuild Œ±lpha
tagline: Ai app builder to build & finish web apps with human support
description: From idea to shipped front-end: clean React + Tailwind code you own. Edit visually, prompt changes, one-click publish on managed cloud,export anytime. No lock-in. More features next release - create full stack applications & full code export (incl backend)

name: atypica.AI
tagline: The AI Market Research Agent Simulating Consumers
description: atypica.AI is an AI research agent that understands consumers, making market research faster, cheaper and broader. Atypica automatically plans the investigation, builds personas, conducts interviews, and generates expert-level business reports in MINUTES.
